body: Just why all the fucking bastards ends with happy ending .... Just someone show them hell

Well this is just hentai story afterall, just read it and over. But allow me to give some opinion about the story : 1st I have pitty for the husband (father) from the start he's don't know anything and finally must have miserable experience about his wife. He is THE REAL VICTIM in this story. 2nd For Mutsu (son) his mind is finally break, well he get a chance to fuck his mother afterall and that girl until the last page of this story, so I don't really feel bad about him. 3rd The girl from the start is victim of being raped by her teacher, even finally she become a slut (last story when she kidnap Mutsu in her house just to fuck her when she's come back from sell out her body) And finally 4th I really don't like about the ending for Yuu and Mutsu's mother. I mean the villain and the slutty mother doesn't deserve have a happy ending. Well that's just my opinion...
